headline: O’Reilly Automotive, Inc. Board of Directors Approves 15-for-1 Stock Split, Subject to Shareholder Approval of an Increase in the Number of Authorized Shares of Common Stock
summary: Board approves 15-for-1 stock split, subject to shareholder approval of share authorization increaseSplit is aimed at helping team members take advantage of employee stock purchase benefits SPRINGFIELD, Mo., March 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- O’Reilly Automotive, Inc. (the “Company” or “O’Reilly”) (Nasdaq: ORLY), a leading retailer in the automotive aftermarket industry, today announced that its Board of Directors (the “Board”) approved a 15-for-1 split of its common stock, to be effected in the
